actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore income averaging and thereby provide economic stimulus to the agriculture industry.

summary.text: Income Averaging Restoration Act of 1992 - Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to restore Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to income averaging.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore income averaging and thereby provide economic stimulus to the agriculture industry.
